S.FORM: Oco hya' ga syuw na hiyal. kwara' kinghciyan niya' 10,180,000 sq km (maki' tay 1ginkgan kin wahci') Kinkhmayan kwara' squliq hya' ga 746,419,440. cinkhulan sa knita' sa brbiru'
Oco hya' ga syow na hiyal. kwara' kinghciyan niya' 10,180,000 sq km (maki' tay 1ginkgan kin wahci') Kinkhmayan kwara' sqoliq hya' ga 746,419,440. cinkholan sa knita' sa brbiro'
